entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:39 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:39 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:39 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
